item.description:
Save Venice-Boston funds art restoration projects in the city on the sea. The annual meeting is short and is followed by an illustrated presentation. This year it is "Venice Through the Looking Glass" by fine art photographer Abelardo Morell. Meeting begins at 6:30, preceded by a wine and hors d'oeuvres reception at 5:45. Send check made out to "Save Venice, Boston" for $40 to Susan Angelastro, 65 Mount Vernon St. #8, Boston MA 02108. Your name will be on a list at the door. Buzz door and say you are attending the Save Venice Event, which is on the 2nd floor.

You must be pre-registered to attend. Club requires Coat and tie for gents.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Save Venice Annual Meeting and talk on Venice
